alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Henry; Newton; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:31AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockdale, central Henry, central Walton and central Newton Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 229 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Walnut Grove to near Kelleytown, and moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Stockbridge, Loganville, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Walnut Grove, Between, Jersey, Lakeview Estates, Georgia International Horse Park, Ola, Big Haynes Creek Park, Pannell, Flippen, Kelleytown and Oak Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
